name: .PMX File Extension
summary: Learn about .PMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D model used by MikuMikuDance (MMD), a dance animation program originally created in Japanese; contains a 3D mesh for models, dancers, characters, and other accessories that can be texturized and animated with the MikuMikuDance tools; used for storing different dancer models.

content: PMX files have morphs that can alter different aspects of a model's appearance, such as the color of components, positioning of model bones, and model transparencies. The morphs in PMX file are more advanced than those in .PMD files. PMX files are located in the "Models" folder.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
